## serializedScalar() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function serializedScalar<S, T>(
  initialState: T,
  serializer: Serializer<S, T>
```

| ------------ | ----------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| initialState | <code>T</code>                      | The initial state                        |
